Review.Titre: I don’t know why I’m receiving this…
Review.Contenu: I don’t know why I’m receiving this message. I did not purchase anything.

Review.Titre: At this time i love everything about…
Review.Contenu: At this time i love everything about MedBridge

Review.Titre: I cannot log in to the account created…
Review.Contenu: I cannot log in to the account created by Fortis using yahoo mail account to complete my training for Select Hospice training. When I log in, I end up in a weird place where Medbridge thinks I am a health care provider and want to pay for some courses
This is one of the best education platforms I have used in my ten years of Nursing. I will give it 10/10 stars for content and organization

Review.Titre: My problem should have been a easy fix
Review.Contenu: My problem should have been a easy fix. After 2 calls with no help, I figured out what the issue was. This isn't rocket science. Your staff need a lot better training.

Review.Titre: once the course was completed the page…
Review.Contenu: once the course was completed the page would freeze and the survey would not load and the course would not show completed or the certificate would not come up.

Horrible and time  consuming  experience. Knowledge is the key for every  health care practitioner however you  modules are too  time consuming.  I felt disrespected by forcing me to  complete such time consuming mandatory especially when all  facilities have  the  same  subject every year on and on.

Review.Titre: Have yet to send my child abuse…
Review.Contenu: Have yet to send my child abuse completion electronically to the PA state board.  Therefore is going to disrupt my renewal process.

Review.Titre: takes too much time for something u get no CEUs for
Review.Contenu: dont like it

Review.Titre: No response after adequate amount of…
Review.Contenu: No response after adequate amount of time.

Med bridge has been reliable so far. It is hard to find some basic exercises and some more multidirectional/body part exercises. The form is not always 100% mostly posture or hip ER. Overall though med bridge gives me good exercise examples for my patients.

Review.Titre: I cannot connect on my phone
the app stopped and kept me from…
Review.Contenu: the app stopped and kept me from proceeding

Review.Titre: I have had several patients tell me…
Review.Contenu: I have had several patients tell me that they get random list of exercises sent to them. When I prescribed a list of exercises, the first time it is correct, but then random exercises are sent to them.

Review.Titre: No one responds to my emails!

Review.Contenu: Poor availability of online live webinars. Unable to cancel. No access to home exercises with subscription to all access CEUs.
Great stuff.  very informative.

Review.Titre: Course did not help me pass
Review.Contenu: Course did not help me pass. Missing significant content gaps
not enough useful physical therapy learning modules that are beneficial and can be applied

Review.Titre: This review is based on recent activity…
Review.Contenu: This review is based on recent activity as we have added an employee and began paying three silver subscriptions, and yet the new employee has not had access to any of the silver subscription. I understand that there is a new platform that those we have spoken to are unable to change, which makes no sense to me. Why have we paid for a subscription without access for this employee.? Prior to this recent change, I would have given 5 stars to your staff and the program, however we have struggled with getting any help in making this right.

I tried to use MedBridge for CEU credits and there are only 4 hours of BOC approved CEU hours for ATC’s. This is not a source for enough credits for yearly collection much less the required reporting amount.
Very few live classes. Classes were quite boring and limited learning.
HEP program is good. The training modules are lengthy and do not detail to any particular department.
I reached out and it took approximately 3wks to get my account changed to the correct discipline.
Very slow connection, took me much longer time to finish

Review.Titre: Love this company and couldn't be…
Review.Contenu: Love this company and couldn't be happier.

Review.Titre: I've been a member since close to the…
Review.Contenu: I've been a member since close to the beginning. I am very sad to say that over that course of time, I've seen and experienced a significant decline in several key areas of the service. Additionally, early verbal promises have not been kept.  Sorry,  but I can't write about them here, as it would be too long, etc.

Review.Titre: I receive too many emails from…
Review.Contenu: I receive too many emails from MedBridge.  There should be a way to eliminate some.

Review.Titre: Not sure the passing rates are…pediatric PT
Review.Contenu: Not sure the passing rates are accurate. The information covered was scattered.
Tedious and somewhat childish in presentation

Review.Titre: There is no way to easily choose a…
Review.Contenu: There is no way to easily choose a single exercise to print.

Review.Titre: Speakers could be more engaging/ dynamic

Review.Contenu: 8/22/2023 Some of the program training was delayed and took way too long to complete..you can’t move it along .. to push next until it’s ready.  There is no way of resuming where you left off… I completed training, took the quiz and survey and it did not show up at the end… no way of going back into it and fixing anything!!! Very frustrating!! Please look back and see …on mine. They are incomplete, even when I completed them. There must be a way you can see I took the tests and survey at the end…. It said thank you for completing….. Cheryl Cummings

Review.Titre: It is quite challenging when the…
Review.Contenu: It is quite challenging when the program logs you out so frequently, and then the most recent changes to your program aren't saved and get lost. I sign into the program multiple times within a patient session, which is quite cumbersome

Review.Titre: What is shown on my device is very…
Review.Contenu: What is shown on my device is very different from what was shown in training. No access I could find to dashboard. Had to connect through email to get same information available as in training.
The navagation is slow, and if you try to go back a frame, it sometimes freezes or goes back to the beginning. This is definitely not user friendly

Review.Titre: I found the system difficult to…
Review.Contenu: I found the system difficult to navigate.I was told I needed to use my phone to do the class. The writing was incredibly tiny and difficult to read.can the classes be done on a home computer?
Slow videos, hard to complete while in actual training plus the online/live trainings, and trying to finish medbridge.

Review.Titre: Font is very hard to read on a small…
Review.Contenu: Font is very hard to read on a small screen and as clinicians we use this app on our phones.. the blue text and background makes it even harder

Review.Titre: I prefer to read instead of listen to the content, so on pages where everything that's said is also written, you can't just skip the audio.
Review.Contenu: Can't skip forward when you've already read and understood everything on the page.
Not user friendly. Courses done were not verified and I had to do them again only to be told that the system now can verify them
Videos wer kind of dull, not interactive

Review.Titre: Need more approved courses for PT for…
Review.Contenu: Need more approved courses for PT for West Virginia

I've taken 2 courses in the past 4-6 weeks, which have both had good quality of content. However, the courses do not appear in my course tracker (they're supposed to transfer automatically) and there's no way to see that I've done the courses. So it's an extra hassle trying to figure out how to get credit for the time I've spent.
The formatting is long but thorough.

Although the education courses I took were educational, all of the speakers I had were robotlike, with no personalities, and no entertainment factor, which made it hard to learn because there was nothing memorable about the lectures. Good information just not well executed.  The direction the directors gave these people like; not moving their arms or moving their bodies, or smiling made the education seem very impersonal and almost painful to watch.  I only continued  to watch and finish the courses because I needed them to keep up my continuing education requirements.

Review.Titre: There were a few sections that the…
Review.Contenu: There were a few sections that the review quizzes did not work, and there wouldn't be a question just the answers listed. I also think there could be more "review"/lecture type material rather than the case study/conference style videos.

Graphics are fantastic, but OTs are not being represented enough as instructors. It would be great to have a course that has a PT and OT demonstrate collaboration techniques and benefits of each scope of practice

Review.Titre: Website was not secure it kept going it…
Review.Contenu: Website was not secure it kept going it in and out and every time it went out I had to go back and start my class all over again

This is not about a recent experience, but more about the system as a whole.  I have to continually sign in during my treatments w/pts due to Medbridge kicking me out.  I do not understand why there is such a limited time frame before the log out happens when I do not have any personal info up on the computer.  Another thing....why is the access code for pts tied to the user who created the exercise program?  We have PTA that see our pts and we cannot add on to the pt's exercise program with different user names.  The access code should be unique to each pt and therefore, allow multiple users to contribute to that one access code.  I hope this review helps to improve your program.  Otherwise, I really love the exercise and pt education info available to give to pts.

Review.Titre: It is a very robust platform
Review.Contenu: It is a very robust platform. The CME content is abundant and much of it (though certainly not all) is well done. On the HEP side, while the software is pretty, the UI/UX leaves some to be desired. And the changes they have made recently in the name of adding features are not as helpful as they could be and, more often, make the program more difficult to use by adding steps. Lastly, the response to help questions are long in coming and unhelpful. MB- please get rid of the forced episode of care profile, the 2-screen sign in (every 10 min?).
Quality of the seminars are good. Unfortunately, MedBridge has very few live webinars for speech therapists. I had to sign up with other organizations to meet my live CEU requirements.
There are better websites with applicable information that can be applied to patients. Your website does have great information but not much on the application of that information.

Review.Titre: the material was relevant to acute care processes and protocols and will serve me well
Review.Contenu: the information was appropriate to my position and articulated well also by the instructors
Good topics for CEU's, bought 1 year subscription, then they threw a great' sale' on product... pretty pissed the didn't extend the price offer.

Review.Titre: Had trouble  moving forward on the  heat stroke  webanor
Review.Contenu: Could  not move forward

Review.Titre: Please get more up to date courses
Review.Contenu: Please get more up to date courses.  I feel like I see courses that are all referencing journal articles from the early 2000s

Review.Titre: Hard to hear on a cell phone.
Confusing directions at end of course…
Review.Contenu: Confusing directions at end of course to receive CEUs, no "green button" at the bottom right sorner of the screen.

Review.Titre: I like MedBridge for cont Ed.
Review.Contenu: I like MedBridge. What would make it better is to be reminded of unfinished courses that need completing, and to discover more easily other courses that are most meaningful and relevant to my practice. I didn’t use it as much as I would have liked. The courses I’ve taken have been excellent at that is why I’m renewing. Course recommendations would be welcome!

Review.Titre: it's your basic compliance training modules
Review.Contenu: there were lots of opportunities to engage with the material being presented. the tests make you choose the right answers before you can move on to the next question
The speakers are articulate and knowledgable

Review.Titre: I've always liked content of classes…
Review.Contenu: I've always liked content of classes and the myriad ex picture/video selections.  But, in setting up remote monitoring, I've had difficulty with patients accessing their new accounts, especially if I make an error on any identifying info and then revise it.  There is no clear way to figure out why they can't log in to activate once that happens.  Others access it just fine.

I enjoy the variety of classes that are available. The web pg shows what classes are accredited for the state you live in. All of the mandatory classes for my profession where available. Some classes are boring making it hard to stay focuses. Overall I'm glad I have Medbridge.
Medbridge made purchasing the renewal information I needed. It was delivered straight to my work and in a timely fashion.

Review.Titre: The information is great but with most…
Review.Contenu: The information is great but with most courses are 1 to 2 CEUs. It takes a lot of courses to meet continuing education requirements.  Especially in states like Iowa where you need 40 credits every 2 years. I wish they had larger course offerings.

The courses were good overall, but I would have appreciated the ability to practice a little more instead of Medbridge filling in all the info for all the steps, even if it adds more time to complete the course. Also, the program crashed too often, causing me to have to repeat segments I'd already completed.

Great resource for PT CEUs. It is nice that they have the specialist certifications study courses. Unfortunately, some of our PTs are interested in the ECS and there is not a program for them.  The team is very helpful at getting you set up initially.  I have noticed that when I have additional questions, they are not always quick to response to my emails.Overall, I would recommend them for any PTs.

good course on chronic back pain    relevant informationwould like to know more about thoughts with the geriatric population.   the model he has was perfect size and in great shape.  much unlike our population
Videos were informative and well put together. It would be nice if they were scripted so that you could read along especially in a clinic setting where the volume becomes a distraction.
Good CEUs, handouts and updated info/research.  reason for 4 versus 5 stars is it took me a bit to understand the course formatting and navigating their website.
The program was easy to follow the only thing I didn't like was if you accidentally went out it made you start over again even when you selected resume not start
Medbridge has made the ability to complete CEUs and trainings for the multiple facilities I work at as a Per Diem therapist so easy. Very easy to use.
Most of the videos have been very helpful and interesting, with a lot of good information. Other videos are still good, but a little over my head.

Med Bridge has gathered a wide array of CEU courses. At times they (the instructors)  are more technical and move through very quickly to a point you need to go back 2-3x to catch what they said. Overall very pleased.

Review.Titre: I feel some of the modules are too…
Review.Contenu: I feel some of the modules are too interactive, with a lot of clicking required on different areas. Information is great.
Leatha is great and I am liking the patient
Overall good, except one module kept glitching and wouldn't let me move on. It fixed it, though and so far works 🙂 fine.

Enjoy the range of topics, selection of easy, moderate or advance experience and loss cost of membership.  My only complaint is that I would like the certificates to be sent to the licensing state board.

Review.Titre: The lessons are in a timely fashion
Review.Contenu: The lessons are in a timely fashion, not too long or too short.  Material can be presented a little too quickly at times.  Overall, it is great.

Review.Titre: some of the learnings are great but…
Review.Contenu: some of the learnings are great but some start off and are intoductory and get significantly more difficult or vise versa say advance and are pretty easy
One of the few sites that has quality early intervention courses that are ASHA approved.
Courses were easy to access, quick, well put together and allowed me to stay up to date during the pandemic.
Viviane helped to explain the issue I was having with Medbridge and instructed me on what to do if the problem occurs again.

Review.Titre: The video went our the basics
Review.Contenu: The video went our the basics. It could be improved with more creative interventions.

Review.Titre: The course materials from Addriann Louw…
Review.Contenu: The course materials from Addriann Louw are what brought me to your company. Thank you.
Simple short concise.  I am learning lots from the tests.  Love the explanations of all the answers.
Information was relevant and presented well. System is glitchy .. many minor troubles there .

Review.Titre: The course material is well presented…
Review.Contenu: The course material is well presented with relevant examples and an easy to follow format

Review.Titre: I don’t care for the learning…
Review.Contenu: I don’t care for the learning assessments. Are those mandatory?
Lectures were clearly presented and Medbridge is a convenient way to learn
The website is very organized but there is not enough school-based PT content.
Great content,  easy to access,  decent price point.
Lots of great content but I wish all courses had closed captions available.

Review.Titre: I could not adjust the volume
Review.Contenu: I could not adjust the volume, so a little hard to hear. Otherwise content was good.
Great delivery of information. The quiz and test questions were sometimes  a little difficult to understand, however the ability to review was excellent,
Easy and informative.  The format kept  my interest.   Easy to stop and return

Review.Titre: but actual doing is the way to go for me.
Review.Contenu: the quizzing are great
I was able to get courses on my phone and do them whenever I could. That helps a lot when you do not have much time .The courses are up to date and and helpful.Thank you ,MedBridge!

Review.Titre: Expert Presenters for the topics I have…
Review.Contenu: Expert Presenters for the topics I have reviewed.

Review.Titre: more CEUs accredited in MN would be…
Review.Contenu: more CEUs accredited in MN would be better
The more information given by MedBridge the more we can comply, satisfy and fulfill continuity of care of the patient.

Review.Titre: Lots of accredited courses to choose from
Review.Contenu: Great choice of courses but limited live courses or webinars
Great course with good visual and verbal information
it's okay, it's a little lengthy but educational.

Review.Titre: Good info to learn and remember!
Review.Contenu: The info was pertinent and will be helpful with my job.
The examples help understand concepts more thoroughly.
Great source for learning and completing CE's.

Review.Titre: Great to earn a few CE hrs from the…
Review.Contenu: Great to earn a few CE hrs from the courses. Surveys for each module is too long though.
It made it easy to understand the material. The interactive portions were very helpful.

Review.Titre: Good review on recurring themes in the workplace.
Review.Contenu: Videos were interactive and engaging. Helps in breaking the monotony.

Review.Titre: It was easy to navigate the trainings.

Review.Contenu: The program was easy on use. Informative and fun Interactive Learning

Review.Titre: I appreciate all the courses available…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate all the courses available through MedBridge and other services.   Getting used to video/on-line is a transition.  (Just lacking the interaction with presenter.)  As in all cases, some presenters hold your attention better than others.

Review.Titre: Content is excellent and speaker is…
Review.Contenu: Content is excellent and speaker is clear and concise.

Review.Titre: modules are simple to use and…
Review.Contenu: modules are simple to use and informative
I had an account in 2018 and some of the courses are still offered in 2022. The subjects I choose are job related and I would like more classes for dysphagia and feeding therapy.
used this site to complete mandatory learning modules

Review.Titre: CEU great, HEP program could be better
Review.Contenu: Really love all the continuing education. The HEP builder is good but missing the really convenient feature of it’s competitor HEP2go.com of “applying to all below” the reps/sets/hold times you want for the exercises/stretches. You have to go in a put in each one individually which is frustrating and takes up time. I probably will not renew because of this unfortunately.

really enjoy using medbridge, almost every exercise I need/use is there and I have uploaded several of my own exercises.  my complaint is that medbridge logs me out every few minutes.  There is no personal information or patient information that requires medbridge to log a person out in such a shot time.  I spend way too much time every day logging back in.

MedBridge is a great way to take courses. They provide a lot of variety. I wish that they would have some way to indicate the date the class was made to give the viewer a sense of how new the information was. I like that you can print off the information. I wish there was an easier way to locate a class. Sometimes it is challenging to get a course , because it has a special name to it. Overall a good site.

Review.Titre: The program was easy to navigate.
I like MedBridge as it’s flexible and…
Review.Contenu: I like MedBridge as it’s flexible and has some video demonstrations to help reviewing and learning.  Sometimes I would like to have courses with longer durations from 3 to 6 hours. I have 4 state’s licenses and had issues printing my courses according to state. Have to go back and forth to check for dates and state’s options. Hope you’ll upgrade/ provide options to print the courses with dates ( from and to ) and also according to state with less navigating the options. Thank you,
Good topics but unfortunately no in-person courses yet

Review.Titre: I have enjoyed the review of material and examples presented.
Review.Contenu: Company is presenting a variety of learning materials that are relevant and easy to comprehend.

Review.Titre: Good CE topics for my area of…
Review.Contenu: Good CE topics for my area of expertise, with current research and clinical application. Easy in and out of the of the MedBridge site. Easy to see what courses would fulfill MN ethics requirement. Time spent on the courses were appropriate to the CE credits.
The subject matter is delivered in a clear and organized manner that is easy to understand. The interactive videos work well to support the information.

Review.Titre: the video examples and case studies
Primarily a good value for quality …
Review.Contenu: Primarily a good value for quality  convenient continued education. Comprehensive subject matter presented by a choice of clinical instructors.  Also good for research learning and illustrations that are helpful in patient education.

Review.Titre: I really enjoyed the series of SCERTS…
Review.Contenu: I really enjoyed the series of SCERTS courses. I gave 4 stars because the variety of courses for pediatric practice has not increased in the last few years. Without new courses, I will not be able to use your company next year.
Easy to use. Good information

Review.Titre: 5 stars but don't like being logged out
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love Medbridge as I feel very supported as a physical therapist having one place to access information, education and exercises I can send to my patients. However, I knock off one star (it really should be half a star), as I am frustrated by having to be logged out every 15-30mins. I see patients in 30 or 60 minute blocks, which means having to waste time re-logging in 10-12 times a day. I wish I could have the exercise page opened all day which makes it easier for me to show patients their exercises then quickly add and update their list without having to waste precious time re-logging in. That's the only gripe I have. Otherwise I'm happy with the website.
The elaborate courses especially those that include personal experiences in rehabilitation with the different clients and the approaches to handle them

Review.Titre: Program is well designed for education…
Review.Contenu: Program is well designed for education of the pertinent content. Once or twice it did not save my completed course and I had to repeat.

Review.Titre: I really love this medium for…
Review.Contenu: I really love this medium for continuing education, wish there was some more education for clinical athletic trainers vs rehab/ outreach.

Review.Titre: Well done Educational program is easy to use
Review.Contenu: Educational program is easy to use

Review.Titre: I would like to see more advanced…
Review.Contenu: I would like to see more advanced classes in manual therapy and sport therapy. Otherwise medbridge is really great overall and during corona time it's incredibly convenient.

Review.Titre: I appreciate the opportunity to leave…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the opportunity to leave feedback, however have not been able to hear back yet; I requested another exercise to added. Other than that I have no issues. Thank you!
Very informative from experienced instructors.
It was hard to get hold of customer service by phone when I had issues with MedBridge.  I have enjoyed the Medbridge courses.  There is a lot of courses to choose from

Review.Titre: ease of access in getting seminar
MedBridge has a lot of amazing…
Review.Contenu: MedBridge has a lot of amazing resources! My only complaint is that there are no subtitles on the videos!
Clear and concise information, easy to follow.

Review.Titre: I took courses that included a range of topics
Review.Contenu: I took courses that included a range of topics: reading radiograms, pulmonary PT, neuroanatomy review, fall prevention, etc. Since these were short courses of 1-3 CEUs, I could experiment with material that was new to me as well as refresh my current knowledge. If I found an excellent presenter, I took all of the classes that this person had. If I took a course where the presenter read the notes or read the PowerPoint slides to me, I finished the course and moved on to something else. I gave my review after each course so you already know what I think: you have excellent presenters, good presenters, fair presenters, and poor presenters. Some of the presentations sent me back to research ideas and concepts that I forgot or never knew and I wanted more than what was in the presentation. The more I worked with the material the more I understood. These were the best presentations.
Sometimes the site does not register that I have completed the video. In this case everything went smoothly.
Good information needs better classes with treatment techniques, label dates of classes so you know how current they are. Overall good for internet classes.
Content was good. Just a little slow in parts.
Information was very thorough, but Time consuming
quick and simple questions asked and not too many...keep it at 10 questions please and thank you

Review.Titre: The EMOB line up with charges
Review.Contenu: The EMOB line up with charges. Wish more physicians or dentists and specialists where on as providers.

Review.Titre: I think the MedBridge was helpful in my…
Review.Contenu: I think the MedBridge was helpful in my training for my new position.

Review.Titre: very applicable classes, especially if changing specialities or looking for online certifications
Review.Contenu: especially if changing specialities or looking for online certifications
I found the information helpful, good reminders.
Easy to navigate and find courses that apply to my licensure.

Review.Titre: I am really enjoying the variety of con…
Review.Contenu: I am really enjoying the variety of con ed courses, as well as, the variety of time to completion.
Continuing education courses offered cover many topics.  All that I have taken have been useful to my practice.
The instructors have been great! Clear voices, concise, using examples, and reviewing the info makes it easy to watch and retain the information.

Review.Titre: My experience with Medbridge has been…
Review.Contenu: My experience with Medbridge has been wonderful. Great CEUs with current/empirical studies/topics. Medbridge is easy to access and complete.
Courses are informative and helpful, albeit a little dry.   Information in courses is helpful for the OT field.
The presenter was knowledgeable and provided examples that made the concepts stick.
Good presentation overall, but would have liked more about CBT.  Cases were varied and were straight forward which is good.

Review.Titre: Easy to make exercise programs and…
Review.Contenu: Easy to make exercise programs and complete continuing education. User friendly website, easy to navigate and find different pages or search for what you are looking for.

Review.Titre: The ease of use and finding CEU's that work for the right location
Review.Contenu: I found it easy to sign up, and it has helped my patients' accountability as well as recall of exercises with access to the app.
Love how accessible Medbridge is and allows me to complete CEU's wherever I am. The information is clearly up to date and provides evidence based knowledge.
The courses are very informative and I like the idea of being able to print out the slides before beginning the course, in order to use them for reference.
Convenient, wide variety of subjects with knowledgeable presenters. Makes getting required CEUs so much easier & less expensive. Thank you !
Very helpful. Wide variety of disciplines..

Review.Titre: Great information relevant to my position
Review.Contenu: The presenters were knowledageble and used slides and examples when needed. Topics that can be difficult to understand were explained clearly.

Review.Titre: The person I spoke with was very good
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke with was very good, it took a while to get there - but once I got to him it was great.

Being new to Medbridge, the courses I have taken so far have been great with both audio and video quality. The learning assessments are flexible with retakes to improve scores. So far, I like the available topics and that there are lots of options with 1 hour CEU credits.

Review.Titre: Learned a lot from the courses I took
Review.Contenu: Learned a lot from the courses I took! Great videos to assist with what is being presented (hands on stuff). Also loved the ability to stop at any point and pick up where you left off!

Review.Titre: Learn and earn knowledge the easy way
Review.Contenu: First of all, it's free for us Therapists. Very accessible, very convenient with great topics. I also appreciate that it automatically reports to CE BROKER ( some) .I would like to see more online courses that will include demonstration, videos and pictures.

Review.Titre: So much information to help care for…
Review.Contenu: So much information to help care for home visiting family.

Review.Titre: The topics are displayed well and they…
Review.Contenu: The topics are displayed well and they explained clearly
The course was very informative. It was also convenient and easy to go through all the sessions. Taking the assessment quiz after each session assist with retention of information.

Good selection of courses.  Easy to use.  I like that it includes which courses are approved for each state license and then it is listed on the completed certificate.  Classes were interesting and I enjoyed the powerpoint presentations.

Review.Titre: Medbridge course are easy to take and…
Review.Contenu: Medbridge course are easy to take and done at my convenience. Sometimes I don't have time to do it all at once (not ideal) so I stop and start when it fits into my schedule.  Instructors have been engaging and informative.  Best courses also have real life examples of exercises or testing procedures to watch.
Medbridge has quality continuing Ed courses presented by highly qualified clinicians! Great value in this membership! It’s flexible and easy to use with a deep library of courses.

I enjoy the professionals that are teaching.  The topics have been interesting.  I love the fact that I can download the app on my phone so that I can listen at my convenience.  I am looking forward to getting more useful training from Medbridge.
Excellent. Very easy to navigate all the subjects that I am interested in.

Review.Titre: My remarks on med bridge courses
Review.Contenu: 1. Vivid explanation of courses2. Video illustrations with diagrams and tables.3. Clear vocal, although I feel the volume of the vocal should be a bit louder.4. Seasoned teachers and tutors.5.up to date courses that reflect evidence based practise.

Easy to log in.  No technical issues.  Certificate ready upon completion.  The instructor has a pleasant speaking voice.  I enjoyed the patient demonstration.  As a McKenzie Cert. MDT I very much appreciated her recommendation to take McKenzie courses. All PT's should.  I will probably look into her sarcopenia course.

The instructors I have listened to have been informative, well-prepared and mostly easy to listen to.I really appreciate the huge variety of subjects I can choose from.  This allows mw to expand knowledge without the cost of travel.
Great selection of seminars and courses with very good speakers

The only thing went wrong was, myself, trying to sign on initially.  The presentations were made very interesting and simple to read. The post tests were not too extensive and long and this was the most interesting feature of all. I had a good experience; no complaints. Thanks.

Review.Titre: Strategies to Integrate Function into Rehabilitation Post Stroke
Review.Contenu: This was a very useful educational video.  I plan especially to use ideas such as encouraging forward shifting of the patient's weight over the tibias during transfer, using squat transfers, etc. to re-integrate affected-side use of muscles in functional tasks.  We get used to looking only at safety and efficiency, rather than jump-starting the re-integrating process.

Review.Titre: Great for Athletic Trainers finishing CEU requirements.Just a complete site to be able to…
Review.Contenu: Just a complete site to be able to finish all my CEU's on.
Med bridge is so convenient, You can literally look up anything that you need or want to know more about and find at least one good course on that topic.

Erin, my recruiter was amazing! She answered all of my questions and made me feel like I was part of the team from the very beginning! Emma, my HR director, was wonderful as well! Despite the lengthy process of onboarding and the time it took to navigate through all of the details, Emma was able to guide me and was patient and remained professional every step of the way! Una, my rehab director, is no doubt one of the best managers I have ever worked with. She is very good at her job, as she was a born leader! She has made my orientation a pleasant experience, making me feel comfortable and welcome instantly. THe only complaint I have is the computer system is not user friendly and is very confusing and redundant. I have used better software in the past which makes point of service documentation easier to navigate.

Review.Titre: All the information on everything was…
Review.Contenu: All the information on everything was so great and informative.
This was a great experience! I learned so much while being able to meet my PT Con Ed requirements. I will definitely be going back to unpack some of the lessons to apply with patients.

Review.Titre: Very well organized and clear to follow…
Review.Contenu: Very well organized and clear to follow format makes the whole experience feel very easy and enjoyable. All information given is up to date and top notch making the whole process worth your time.
Excellent slides for new position.

The courses run seamlessly. Each of the sections are kept to a good length before each quiz. Access to slides and other resources is also really helpful. Excellent range of topics to choose from with highly esteemed presenters. Great value for money!

Review.Titre: The videos and sessions are awesome.
Review.Contenu: The videos are great and extremely help full.  I learned a lot and had a wonderful experience.

Review.Titre: Med Bridge makes it simple for…
Review.Contenu: Med Bridge makes it simple for therapists to find the updated education needed to provide good clinical tx and education in all therapy settings.

Review.Titre: Sometimes not able to press next button
Review.Contenu: Sometimes it's difficult to get to press next . Maybe make bigger. More clear on question ie some of answers with multiple answers not clear
I felt it was really informative and well detailed. It was well organized.
Easy to navigate HEP. Easy continuing ed filter for approved courses in my state. Abundance of courses on different topics. Great all around resource

Review.Titre: Great content on both courses I took
Review.Contenu: Great content on both courses I took.  Clearly taught and helpful information.

Review.Titre: Informative Courses and very Handy App
Review.Contenu: I am currently going thru the Medical Screening Certification and it has been very informative. First time using Medbridge and the app, makes going thru the classes so much more convenient even on my daily travel home.

Review.Titre: Video demos are better for me I didn't…
Review.Contenu: Video demos are better for me I didn't see much of it on the training I took, but overall it was well presented.
They have great teachers for what subject you are learning about. Very knowledgeable. I feel like l learn so much from each topic I study. Its been extremely helpful for me.
Informative and convenient to access. I have been using this to really hone my skills as a new, emerging practitioner. Glad to have this in my toolbelt!
It was very informative in an easy to understand format.

Review.Titre: It’s easy and knowledgeable for someone…
Review.Contenu: It’s easy and knowledgeable for someone who may or may not have been to school knowing the information.

Review.Titre: the website is easy to use
Review.Contenu: the website is easy to use and has everything i need for daily clinic use. On top of being a daily use for setting up HEP for patients and physicians clinic I use this for CEU's and certifications.

Review.Titre: I have used this product for years
Review.Contenu: I have used this product for years. Good quality of material to further my education and improve my lack of knowledge in the research area of Physical Therapy. Thank you.

MedBridge has been very helpful in continuing my education. I had to go to a concussion course this past weekend and haven't done vestibular therapy. I was a able to access a beginning course in vestibular therapy and it helped me understand the course material better. Thank you for MedBridge!!
Good! However, when I have to exit Medbridge from  my unfinished educational video, when I log in again, it doesn't take me back where I left off. I have to search for it again.

Review.Titre: Good and useful info and training that…
Review.Contenu: Good and useful info and training that can be applied your the work day
Navigation of the site is easy- I love the ability to offer my patients a wide range of information/education and HEP. The course information has been relevant and useful. Love Medbridge!!
I enjoyed the Medbridge trainings. I especially appreciated the return to patient empathy regarding pain control which has been so lacking since the draconian restrictions of 2016.
Very easy to navigate. Very informative and I like that you take a quiz to test what you learned.
Everything was well explained, and easy to understand.

Review.Titre: On the early part of my experience
Review.Contenu: On the early part of my experience, it has been wonderful and I believe is worth every penny. The courses that I was able to take the past week was amazing.
Ease of technology. Pertinent to my field.simply presented. Good examples with actual “pts”

Review.Titre: Compared to the previous company we did…
Review.Contenu: Compared to the previous company we did our trainings on. I really like this one a lot. And it is user friendly!
Many options to chose from. Great topics for education.  Videos are clear with very good AV to compliment

Review.Titre: I like the short education teaching and…
Review.Contenu: I like the short education teaching and questions right after the sections. The teachers have been very good.

Review.Titre: The videos and instruction for topics
Review.Contenu: The videos and instruction for topics, especially harassment were beneficial for my role as a PT technician and I will be able to utilize the education during my employment at Ivy Rehab

Review.Titre: Medbridge is a very useful tool for professionals like me. All topics that I really wanted to know and exercises that will help my patients are available in this platform
Review.Contenu: Medbridge is a very good resource tool in my clinical practice. It is very efficient and easy to access.
Y’all have good lectures with very inspiring doctors. They do a great job with your presentation.

Review.Titre: The website is easy to navigate with…
Review.Contenu: The website is easy to navigate with lots of relevant courses.  The 3 courses I took were well organized with information I could use immediately in my therapy sessions.
Very important information. I believe every one on the health sector show know and be aware of all these
This is one of my favorite products to use in the clinic and the support with an IT issue was on point.

Review.Titre: I appreciate the fact that the staff…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the fact that the staff was able to provide an answer and solution at the 11th hour going into a weekend since my plan was to complete continuing education outside of my work days.

Review.Titre: the courses are concise and thorough
Review.Contenu: the courses are easy, concise, and more complete than our previous platform. Very happy with the switch.

Review.Titre: It’s very helpful to have access to continuing education with a wide variety of choices.
Review.Contenu: It’s very helpful to have access to home exercise programs, but also the opportunity to do continuing education on our own time.
very user friendly.  great variety of courses.  holds your place well when interrupted.
all info given in a clear and easy to understand manner

Review.Titre: The actual tests that were doe with…
Review.Contenu: The actual tests that were doe with others. How I was able to engage with the material and information
The classes are excellent. Easy to navigate on the website
Regular meetings with rest of team are a big help especially  with phone charting questions
Great contentAwesome variety of courses with interventions and demonstrations that can be put into practice.

Review.Titre: They are concise with good information
Review.Contenu: The subject matter is all completed yearly so it was nice that these are concise and to the point.

Review.Titre: A lot of information was given
Review.Contenu: A lot of information was given, and it would be easier if while doing the Raintree information, that they gave just 1 example of how to navigate, rather than all of them at once.
needed info to transition better.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate and allowed for me to learn how to act in the clinic in the proper way.
Review.Contenu: Easy to navigate and allowed for me to learn a lot of new things. The videos were very helpful and easy to understand from. This course taught me a lot.

Review.Titre: the speakers are very easy to follow
Review.Contenu: the speakers are very easy to follow. Presentation has been well presented .
Information was relevant, exam questions were excellent… you had to have gone through the whole course to know the answers.
Great content and presenters. Immediately utilized what I learned in my practice.

Review.Titre: Not easy to navigate on small tablet is…
Review.Contenu: Not easy to navigate on small tablet is all I have that is negative

Review.Titre: Current with the evidence on CE
Review.Contenu: Current with the evidence on continuing education for PT's notably the OCS prep training.
Excellent options for coursework and thorough coverage of all Dx's and areas of practice.
The brief section "quizzes" were more beneficial than a questionnaire/"test" about the entire presentation.

Review.Titre: I found the modules very informative
Review.Contenu: I found the modules very informative, and I learned a lot about the company.
I like the fact I can complete my continuing education requirements online at home.

Review.Titre: Having access to medbridge again has…
Review.Contenu: Having access to medbridge again has been a great asset to my continuing education

Review.Titre: Clear education to the point and a…
Review.Contenu: Clear education to the point and a great speaker

Review.Titre: Plenty of course for my needed topic…
Review.Contenu: Plenty of course for my needed topic and good information to use.
There are a variety of information to choose from for CEUs.
